item.title: Nvidia’s stock is losing steam, and this week’s earnings could underscore the risks
item.description: The chip stock snapped a four-week streak of gains. BofA analysts say this week’s earnings report could include “messy” guidance.

item.title: Trump’s new tariff threats may shake stocks’ rally as investors brace for a long, hot summer
item.description: Just as investors thought they could take a break from tariff scares, President Trump’s threats of new levies against the EU and Apple threw trade ten...

item.title: I’m hosting a Memorial Day barbecue. Would it be so bad to ask my guests to make financial contributions?
item.description: “I have a credit-card bill I’m trying to pay off, which just got bigger due to a broken shower.”

item.title: Trump threatens Apple with 25% tariff: Is now a good time to buy an iPhone?
item.description: On Friday, President Donald Trump threatened Apple with 25% tariffs on any iPhone sold, but not made, in the U.S.

item.title: My daughter’s boyfriend, a guest in my home, offered to powerwash part of my house — then demanded money
item.description: “The amount was about what I would have paid to get the whole house done, and not just one side.’
